content: I think I might have gotten my wires crossed earlier. I actually attended a book reading event where Emma Taylor read from her new novel, "The Lost City". It was really interesting, and I got my book signed afterwards. I think it might be worth checking out if you're interested in cultural themes and identity in fantasy novels. Anyway, back to "The Poppy War" - what do you think about the world-building in the novel? I've heard it's really immersive and detailed.
